name: SewerRush
description:
Get trough a maze of traps and slimes while collecting resources necessary to upgrade your weapons. Different resources are placed in differents parts of map. Be carefull as you have only 3 minutes to prepare for an EPIC Boss fight!!

Made for BossRushGamejam2023

Programming by Kamil Kwiatkowski
Level design by Bartosz Szczygłowski
Art by Ada Połeć and Ania Bubula
Animations by Ada Połeć
Soundtrack by Szymon Molęda

Sound effects obtained from:
https://freesound.org/
https://mixkit.co/
https://pixabay.com/
https://www.zapsplat.com/
And edited by Szymon Molęda
